column4: Description (English)

The TSB occurrence number; a unique identifier for the occurrence. The "P" is to identify Pipeline mode followed by 2 digits to identify the year of the occurrence. The letter after the year is to identify the TSB region responsible for investigating the occurrence. This is followed by the sequential number assigned by the PODS application.
The occurrence identification number; a unique identifier for the occurrence assigned by PODS.
A system-generated number for the purposes of database administration.
The TSB investigation classification of the occurrence, in English. See http://www.tsb.gc.ca/eng/lois-acts/evenements-occurrences.asp.
The TSB investigation classification of the occurrence, in French. See http://www.bst.gc.ca/fra/lois-acts/evenements-occurrences.asp.
A system-generated number for the purposes of database administration.
Identifies whether the occurrence was an accident or reportable incident, in English. See http://www.tsb.gc.ca/eng/lois-acts/evenements-occurrences.asp.
Identifies whether the occurrence was an accident or reportable incident, in French. See http://www.bst.gc.ca/fra/lois-acts/evenements-occurrences.asp.
The date of the occurrence. Date format is YYYY-MM-DD.
The time of the occurrence. Time format is hh:mm (24-hour clock).
A system-generated number for the purposes of database administration.
The time zone of the occurrence, in English, as reported by the pipeline operator. The time zone may or may not correspond to the occurrence location time zone.
The time zone of the occurrence, in French, as reported by the pipeline operator. The time zone may or may not correspond to the occurrence location time zone.
A system-generated number for the purposes of database administration.
The province of the occurrence location, in English.
The province of the occurrence location, in French.
A system-generated number for the purposes of database administration.
The town, city, or village nearest to the occurrence, in English.
The town, city, or village nearest to the occurrence, in French.
The longitude of the town, city, or village nearest to the occurrence.
The latitude of the town, city, or village nearest to the occurrence.
A system-generated number for the purposes of database administration.
The administrative region of the occurrence, in English.
The administrative region of the occurrence, in French.
A system-generated number for the purposes of database administration.
The administrative region of the TSB responsible for investigating the occurrence, in English.
The administrative region of the TSB responsible for investigating the occurrence, in French.
A system-generated number for the purposes of database administration.
The English name of the pipeline operator.
The French name of the pipeline operator.
A system-generated number for the purposes of database administration.
The name of the facility, in English.
The name of the facility, in French.
A system-generated number for the purposes of database administration.
The type of facility (compressor station, gas processing plant, pump station, etc.), in English.
The type of facility (compressor station, gas processing plant, pump station, etc.), in French.
A system-generated number for the purposes of database administration.
The name of the pipeline, in English.
The name of the pipeline, in French.
A system-generated number for the purposes of database administration.
The type of pipeline, in English.
The type of pipeline, in French.
A system-generated number for the purposes of database administration.
The equipment or component of the pipeline that was affected, in English.
The equipment or component of the pipeline that was affected, in French.
A system-generated number for the purposes of database administration.
The product carried by the pipeline/facility at the time of the occurrence, in English.
The product carried by the pipeline/facility at the time of the occurrence, in French.
A system-generated number for the purposes of database administration.
The type of product released as a result of the occurrence, in English.
The type of product released as a result of the occurrence, in French.
A system-generated number for the purposes of database administration.
How the occurrence was detected or discovered, or the person or entity that detected or discovered it, in English.
How the occurrence was detected or discovered, or the person or entity that detected or discovered it, in French.
A system-generated number for the purposes of database administration.
The general type of land use in the vicinity of the occurrence, in English.
The general type of land use in the vicinity of the occurrence, in French.
A system-generated number for the purposes of database administration.
The entity involved in the activity that affected the structural integrity of the pipeline, in English.
The entity involved in the activity that affected the structural integrity of the pipeline, in French.
A system-generated number for the purposes of database administration.
The type of hazard, in English.
The type of hazard, in French.
A system-generated number for the purposes of database administration.
Indicates whether the activity was authorized, in English.
Indicates whether the activity was authorized, in French.
A system-generated number for the purposes of database administration.
The type of threat to the structural integrity of the pipeline, in English.
The type of threat to the structural integrity of the pipeline, in French.
The date on which the occurrence was entered into the TSB database.
The date on which the initial occurrence details were released to the occurrence notification log.
Additional details or a short description of the pipeline equipment or component affected (when applicable).
The total number of persons evacuated as a result of the occurrence (when applicable).
The quantity of product released (when applicable), measured in cubic metres.
The quantity of product recovered (when applicable), measured in cubic metres.
A brief description of the occurrence, in the language in which it was received.
The length of time, in hours, for which the operation of the pipeline was interrupted.
The kilometre post of the occurrence location (when applicable).
The nominal pipe size, in inches.
The reference numbers of any safety communications related to the occurrence that may have been issued by the TSB.
Indicates whether product was released from the line pipe body.
Indicates whether the occurrence resulted in any fatal or serious injuries.
Indicates whether property other than that owned by the pipeline operator was damaged as a result of the occurrence.
Indicates whether there was fire or ignition.
Indicates whether there was an explosion.
Indicates whether product was released.
A system-generated number for the purposes of database administration.
The product that was released, in English.
The product that was released, in French.
Indicates whether a metallurgical report in relation to this occurrence is on file.
Indicates whether the operation of the pipeline was interrupted.
Indicates whether there was an evacuation.
Indicates whether the occurrence was reported to the TSB by telephone.
Indicates whether there was a pipeline rupture.
Indicates whether the pipeline was operated beyond design limits or operating restrictions.
Indicates whether the pipeline restricted the safe operation of any mode of transportation.
Indicates whether there was a toxic plume.

column3: Event off company property or right-of-way
column4: Indicates whether the released product left company property or the right-of-way.
Indicates whether the released product is considered a fugitive gas emission.
Indicates whether any safety communications related to the occurrence have been issued by the TSB.
Indicates whether geotechnical, hydrotechnical, or environmental activity posed a threat to the safe operation of the pipeline.
Indicates whether TSB investigators were deployed to the occurrence site.

column3: Object came into contact with pipeline
column4: Indicates whether the pipeline sustained damage that affected its safe operation as a result of another object coming into contact with it.
Indicates whether the occurrence resulted in any significant environmental impacts.
The date on which this occurrence was reported to the TSB. Date format is YYYY-MM-DD.
The time at which this occurrence was reported to the TSB. Time format is hh:mm (24-hour clock).
A system-generated number for the purposes of database administration.
The time zone for the time at which the occurrence was reported to the TSB, in English.
The time zone for the time at which the occurrence was reported to the TSB, in French.
A system-generated number for the purposes of database administration.
The province of the pipeline company contact person, in English.
The province of the pipeline company contact person, in French.

column3: Date National Energy Board was notified by TSB
column4: The date on which the TSB notified the National Energy Board, if applicable. Date format is YYYY-MM-DD.

column3: Time National Energy Board was notified by TSB
column4: The time at which the TSB notified the National Energy Board, if applicable (Eastern time). Time format is hh:mm (24-hour clock).
The date on which the TSB received the notification call. Date format is YYYY-MM-DD.
The time at which the TSB received the notification call (Eastern time). Time format is hh:mm (24-hour clock).
The total number of persons seriously injured as a result of the occurrence.
The total number of persons fatally injured as a result of the occurrence.

The TSB occurrence number; a unique identifier for the occurrence. The "P" is to identify Pipeline mode followed by 2 digits to identify the year of the occurrence. The letter after the year is to identify the TSB region responsible for investigating the occurrence. This is followed by the sequential number assigned by the PODS application.
The occurrence identification number; a unique identifier for the occurrence assigned by PODS.
A system-generated number for the purposes of database administration.
A system-generated number for the purposes of database administration.
The category (role) of the injured person, in English.
The category (role) of the injured person, in French.
The number of fatally injured persons.
The number of seriously injured persons.
